tool_description: The top-rated Lead Generation API on RapidAPI that gives valid business emails among all profiles downloaded. Our system downloads the profiles instantly after the API is called, ensuring the data is always fresh and up-to-date.
title: Generate LinkedIn Leads

api_list.name: Get Leads
api_list.description: Get Leads along with number of pages. It Get 25 Leads per page. Visit https://rapidapi.com/Chetan11dev/api/generate-linkedin-leads/tutorials/get-leads-params to see params options.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-linkedin-leads.p.rapidapi.com/backend/leads/leads/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-linkedin-leads.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
